channel.title: HolyPkerz v2 - AllstarScape Edited - Czar based - 24/7
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://s863.photobucket.com/user/HolyPkerz/media/GFX-NEWBANNER-RSPS.gif.html][IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/GFX-NEWBANNER-RSPS.gif[/img][/URL] [size=14pt]We're Back 24/7! This is the original HolyPkerz v2[/size]
Warning: This is a really old-school, czar-based server. You need our client or something similar like StabbingScape. Use our client for the best experience.
[url=http://holypkerz.forummotions.com]Forums[/url]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/uaa9af3ccud2527/Official+HolyPkerz+Client.rar]Client Download[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/0a2hhcuj7a0t98d/HolyPkerz+Beta+Client.rar]Beta Client Download[/url]
[size=12pt]Our Server Features:[/size] [size=10pt] - AllstarScape Based - Updated regularly - Fully working guthans - Fully working veracs - Fully working dharoks - Protect from melee (blocks 40% of damage against bosses) - Ultimate strength prayer - Working prayer pots - Items on death via quest tab - Attack type saves on logout - Clan Chat (shows up in music tab) - Clan Wars - Improved skilling - Darkbow 2x hit - Custom Ticket System - Ticket Shop - Armor and Skillcape Trimming - Dfs and Gs making - Custom Bosses - Great eco - Stable Server - Npc Retailiation
Clan Wars [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/HolyPkerz1.jpg[/img]
Dark Bow [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/HolyPkerz2.jpg[/img]
Guthans [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/HolyPkerz3.jpg[/img]
Ticket Shop [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/HolyPkerz4.jpg[/img]
Clan Chat [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/clanchat.jpg[/img]
Skills [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/woodcutting.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/mining.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/smithing.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/fishing.jpg[/img] [/size] [/center]

item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

Some clients don’t have the right login protocols so you won’t even be able to get in.

And as for retiring, it doesn’t really matter too much to me. I’d like more players, but otherwise I’ll just keep updating until more players come.

item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

Loveandpower:

good luck good to see allstar is making a turn again

Lol I would NOT say that :palm:

OT: Rage, sorry to break it to ya but holypkerz time has come and passed… There is not one time that I login and there’s actually another player lol… I think you need to retire HP
